name: mental-herb
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is attracted, it consumes this item to cure the attraction.
short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure infatuation. Gen V: Also removes Taunt, Encore, Torment, Disable, and Cursed Body.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that snaps POKéMON out of infatuation.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that snaps POKéMON out of infatuation.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. It snaps the holder out of infatuation. It can be used once.
